Description:
Fifth point prevalence study testing: The VBSO conducted its fifth point prevalence study (PPS) in partnerships with the VDH on Friday, Dec. 4, testing 1,518 inmates, deputies, civilian staff and contractors. Those test results are as follows:
Of the 45 inmates who tested positive, 32 are new cases and 13 previously tested positive. Since the last mass testing on Nov. 20, there has been a 46% reduction in inmate cases and a 71% reduction in staff cases. For full information on these test results and the VBSO's response, visit vbso.net/news.
